# WEAPON::GIVE_WEAPON_OBJECT_TO_PED

## Summary
Attach the specified weapon (created via CREATE_WEAPON_OBJECT) to the specified ped

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** weaponObject
* **PED_INDEX** ped
